alert.note: Alert for Barton; Ellsworth; Rice (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 14 at 1:39PM CDT until July 14 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN RICE...SOUTHWESTERN ELLSWORTH AND BARTON COUNTIES... At 138 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles north of Lorraine to near Albert, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hoisington, Claflin, Holyrood, Bushton, Albert, Lorraine, Olmitz, Galatia, Susank, Cheyenne Bottoms and Odin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
